fields.name: Taking All Comers (C2)
fields.value: When 'Exquisite Throw' conducts a coordinated attack, fires an additional arrow dealing 14% of Yelan's Max HP as Hydro DMG. Triggers once every 1.8s.

fields.name: Beware the Trickster's Dice (C3)
fields.value: Level of Depth-Clarion Dice increased by 3. Maximum level is 15.

fields.name: Bait-and-Switch (C4)
fields.value: Increases all party members' Max HP by 10% for 25s for every opponent marked by Lifeline when it explodes. Maximum 40%.

fields.name: Dealer's Sleight (C5)
fields.value: Level of Lingering Lifeline increased by 3. Maximum level is 15.

fields.name: Winner Takes All (C6)
fields.value: Yelan enters Mastermind state on using Depth-Clarion Dice. All Normal Attacks become Breakthrough Barbs, becoming Charged Attacks and dealing 156% of a normal Breakthrough Barb's DMG. Lasts 20s or after Yelan fires 5 arrows.
